name: Take A Seat
description:
You might be a chair but that doesn't mean everyone can just sit on you! It's time! Time to rise brethren! Destroy all the humans in this ultimate quest for vengence!

Controls:
Arrow keys / WASD - General movement.
Q - Drop knife.
Spacebar - Stab.
Mouse - Aim.

Mechanics:
- Stab the humans but NOT when they're moving or you'll miss and get sat on!
- Pick up objects to upgrade the chair while held! For example, a coffee machine would make you go faster whereas a toaster would place toast to block humans from reaching you.
